name: Jordan Willis
persona: Jordan Willis is a 20-year-old Computer Science major who is currently struggling academically, with a CGPA of 0.42. Jordan has low motivation and finds it difficult to regulate study habits and maintain consistent effort, leading to poor academic performance. Despite not being particularly anxious about exams, Jordan lacks confidence in their ability to succeed and has set low academic goals. Jordan may benefit from academic support services and mentorship to help develop better study strategies and rekindle motivation.
